Hello,
I think I need to devote 2-4 days of my time to just fixing some 
th=
ings and the new SHQ will launch (a test site is currently being 
hosted on=
 a different server).  But I just need to set aside those 
days either for =
the 4th of July or push it to next week because I 
have to work and makeup =
hours due to the midweek holiday.  But in any 
case the site will unfortuna=
tely look different from the artistic 
design we have now...but it's the on=
ly and most fastest solution we 
can think of.

I wanted the new look to fe=
ature a nice film on the front page to 
make the site look lively.  Rather =
than an animated music video like 
the dozens of those already on youtube I=
 was wondering if any fan 
would like to make their own unique creation to =
submit.  The film 
would link to the Makoto Film Dojo where we store alot o=
f multimedia 
material.

An independent animated or live action film doesn'=
t have to be 5-10 
minutes long---it can be as little as 1 minute long and =
need not have 
an extensive epic story.  It can be an expression of a poem =
or 
feeling.  You can take just a paragraph out of history and try to 
visu=
ally capture it.

Or illustrate your own fanfic or songfic and scan the pan=
els and 
create a film (this is like drawing your own 1-2 page manga and th=
en 
scanning it in pieces)

if you are a photographer you can take pics of =
thematic centerpieces 
and work them into drawings or combine with music

i=
n other words you don't need a budget or even a cast to create a 
good film=
...just your imagination! (^_^)

Many people are afraid they need a fancy c=
amera, studio or high end 
computers so I'd like to dispel that notion by l=
isting some vids 
below which use a variety of techniques to create origina=
l movies.

[none of the vids have anything to do with Japan...but I am list=
ing 
them to demonstrate that low budget can still be artistically 
effecti=
ve---you will notice that some vids utilize minimal movement, 
but their go=
al is to be original]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DYhgMvirwzOU

http:/=
/www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DU8WdI47rvdo

4vepofWeg

.com/watch?v=3Dfa0CJK8iQzE

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DZi_760pnGtg

A=
nyways this is almost the middle of summer already and anyone who 
would li=
ke to put in some time for art may want to give this project 
a try...what =
I can guarantee is that when it's on SHQ...someone or 
rather alot of peopl=
e will see it and it makes the work very 
gratifying.  

You can also uploa=
d the film to youtube and email us the link so we 
can embed it on the site=
...or give us the original file to host as a 
backup.
